command.text: select "Customer"."ParrentId" "ParrentId" ,"Parrent"."CustomerCode" "ParrentCustomerCode" ,"ParrentAddress"."Address" "ParrentAddressAddress" ,"ParrentAddressAddrressType"."AddressCode" "ParrentAddressAddrressTypeAddressCode" ,"ParrentLocations"."LocationsCode" "ParrentLocationsLocationsCode" ,"ParrentLocationsAddress"."Address" "ParrentLocationsAddressAddress" ,"Customer"."CustomerId" "CustomerId" ,"Customer"."CustomerCode" "CustomerCode" ,"Customer"."CustomerName" "CustomerName" ,"Customer"."LocationsId" "LocationsId" ,"Locations"."LocationsCode" "LocationsLocationsCode" ,"LocationsAddress"."Address" "LocationsAddressAddress" ,"LocationsAddressAddrressType"."AddressCode" "LocationsAddressAddrressTypeAddressCode" ,"Customer"."AddressId" "AddressId" ,"Address"."Address" "AddressAddress" ,"AddressAddrressType"."AddressCode" "AddressAddrressTypeAddressCode" from "dbo"."Customer" "Customer" left join "dbo"."Customer" "Parrent" on "Customer"."ParrentId" = "Parrent"."CustomerId" left join "dbo"."Address" "ParrentAddress" on "Parrent"."AddressId" = "ParrentAddress"."AddressId" left join "dbo"."AddressType" "ParrentAddressAddrressType" on "ParrentAddress"."AddrressTypeId" = "ParrentAddressAddrressType"."AddressTypeId" left join "dbo"."Locations" "ParrentLocations" on "Parrent"."LocationsId" = "ParrentLocations"."LocationsId" left join "dbo"."Address" "ParrentLocationsAddress" on "ParrentLocations"."AddressId" = "ParrentLocationsAddress"."AddressId" left join "dbo"."Locations" "Locations" on "Customer"."LocationsId" = "Locations"."LocationsId" left join "dbo"."Address" "LocationsAddress" on "Locations"."AddressId" = "LocationsAddress"."AddressId" left join "dbo"."AddressType" "LocationsAddressAddrressType" on "LocationsAddress"."AddrressTypeId" = "LocationsAddressAddrressType"."AddressTypeId" left join "dbo"."Address" "Address" on "Customer"."AddressId" = "Address"."AddressId" left join "dbo"."AddressType" "AddressAddrressType" on "Address"."AddrressTypeId" = "AddressAddrressType"."AddressTypeId"

field.name: ParrentAddressAddrressTypeAddressCode
field.label: Parrent Address Addrress Type Address Code

field.name: LocationsAddressAddrressTypeAddressCode
field.label: Locations Address Addrress Type Address Code

command.text: select "Employee"."EmployeeId" "EmployeeId" ,"Employee"."EmployeeCode" "EmployeeCode" ,"Employee"."EmployeeName" "EmployeeName" ,"Employee"."DepartmentId" "DepartmentId" ,"Department"."DepartmentCode" "DepartmentDepartmentCode" ,"Employee"."AddressId" "AddressId" ,"Address"."Address" "AddressAddress" ,"AddressAddrressType"."AddressCode" "AddressAddrressTypeAddressCode" ,"Employee"."LocationsId" "LocationsId" ,"Locations"."LocationsCode" "LocationsLocationsCode" ,"LocationsAddress"."Address" "LocationsAddressAddress" ,"LocationsAddressAddrressType"."AddressCode" "LocationsAddressAddrressTypeAddressCode" from "dbo"."Employee" "Employee" left join "dbo"."Department" "Department" on "Employee"."DepartmentId" = "Department"."DepartmentId" left join "dbo"."Address" "Address" on "Employee"."AddressId" = "Address"."AddressId" left join "dbo"."AddressType" "AddressAddrressType" on "Address"."AddrressTypeId" = "AddressAddrressType"."AddressTypeId" left join "dbo"."Locations" "Locations" on "Employee"."LocationsId" = "Locations"."LocationsId" left join "dbo"."Address" "LocationsAddress" on "Locations"."AddressId" = "LocationsAddress"."AddressId" left join "dbo"."AddressType" "LocationsAddressAddrressType" on "LocationsAddress"."AddrressTypeId" = "LocationsAddressAddrressType"."AddressTypeId"

field.name: LocationsAddressAddrressTypeAddressCode
field.label: Locations Address Addrress Type Address Code

command.text: select "Locations"."LocationsId" "LocationsId" ,"Locations"."LocationsName" "LocationsName" ,"Locations"."LocationsCode" "LocationsCode" ,"Locations"."AddressId" "AddressId" ,"Address"."Address" "AddressAddress" ,"AddressAddrressType"."AddressCode" "AddressAddrressTypeAddressCode" ,"Locations"."ParrentLocationsId" "ParrentLocationsId" ,"ParrentLocations"."LocationsName" "ParrentLocationsLocationsName" ,"ParrentLocationsAddress"."Address" "ParrentLocationsAddressAddress" ,"ParrentLocationsAddressAddrressType"."AddressCode" "ParrentLocationsAddressAddrressTypeAddressCode" from "dbo"."Locations" "Locations" left join "dbo"."Address" "Address" on "Locations"."AddressId" = "Address"."AddressId" left join "dbo"."AddressType" "AddressAddrressType" on "Address"."AddrressTypeId" = "AddressAddrressType"."AddressTypeId" left join "dbo"."Locations" "ParrentLocations" on "Locations"."ParrentLocationsId" = "ParrentLocations"."LocationsId" left join "dbo"."Address" "ParrentLocationsAddress" on "ParrentLocations"."AddressId" = "ParrentLocationsAddress"."AddressId" left join "dbo"."AddressType" "ParrentLocationsAddressAddrressType" on "ParrentLocationsAddress"."AddrressTypeId" = "ParrentLocationsAddressAddrressType"."AddressTypeId"
